name: TheAtlantic
text: President Trump has continued to lie about the reason for surges in COVID-19 infections, blaming Mexico and the recent racial-justice protests. That and more in @realcpaz's tracker: https://t.co/iVWYJqKFZy

name: TheAtlantic
text: Is it just us, or are a lot of people buying cars right now? Listen to @yayitsrob and @jameshamblin discuss "COVID cars" on the podcast "Social Distance." https://t.co/Ij8w2M1RUd

name: TheAtlantic
text: Democrats gave a hero’s welcome to Andrew Cuomo despite his mistake-filled early response to the coronavirus pandemic, @russellberman writes: https://t.co/FwvHhWueVB

name: TheAtlantic
TheAtlantic
text: RT @nora_kelly: .@russellberman: "The governor’s buoyant image has been a study in the power of public communication to overshadow policy failures." https://t.co/Rqsc5vsO96

name: TheAtlantic
text: RT @prashantrao: "I’ve seen good-faith attempts at reviving traditional medicine get overtaken by Hindu nationalist rhetoric of restoring India to some past glory." — @VidyaKrishnan in @TheAtlantic https://t.co/yoAsNRywhT

name: TheAtlantic
text: An election is a big deal for the Postal Service, “but it’s no Christmas,” our reporter points out. Here’s what experts are actually concerned about. The latest Atlantic Daily, from @mimbsy: https://t.co/Fk9HB8zfgB

name: TheAtlantic
text: Democrats gave a hero’s welcome to Andrew Cuomo last night despite his mistake-filled early response to the coronavirus pandemic, @russellberman writes: https://t.co/qIHH3vJtLB

name: TheAtlantic
text: "We face two hours a night of two-minute speeches and other forms of propaganda live-streaming from the nowhere of cyberspace, while our only hope of surprise lies in the prospect of a technological disaster," Andrew Ferguson writes: https://t.co/mSwuhk5QQ8

name: TheAtlantic
text: As India battles the coronavirus, science is doing battle with pseudoscience. As a result, @VidyaKrishnan writes, the balance between modern medicine and traditional treatments is tipping in the wrong direction: https://t.co/4Whg0m7jeu

name: TheAtlantic
text: In theory medications should be given to patients when they're most needed. But that's not how hospitals work, writes @EmilyAnthes: https://t.co/HX5hacRocj

name: TheAtlantic
text: RT @slaskow: There's an ideal time to take certain medications, according to your biological clock. But that's not the schedule hospitals are on, @emilyanthes writes: https://t.co/slJMzgRvUe

name: TheAtlantic
text: "To say that virtual pre-K didn’t go well would be an understatement. On day one Raffi cried, screamed, hit his parents, hit his brother, broke things, and spat a cup of juice all over my laptop," @EmilyGould writes: https://t.co/RdmMY0LMNd

name: TheAtlantic
text:
Rose McGowan has accused the director Alexander Payne of sexual misconduct.

In January, McGowan, who has also accused Harvey Weinstein of rape, spoke with @sophieGG about the costs incurred by those who speak up about sexual assault: https://t.co/Xf0tHgyG5u
